Name: market for cement, Portland | cement, Portland | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: Due to low price, big weight and consumers distribution cement is not traded globally. In case of Switzerland app. 98% of production coming from Switzerland is also consumed in Switzerland (UN comtrade database). This assessment is confirmed by an expert in the field.
